entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • overscroll stretching in Android 12 BlazorMaui #16239
  • MAUI App is not supporting iOS 17 Beta version #16236
  • TapGestureRecognizer NumberOfTapsRequired=2 Handled Differently on Windows and Android #16235
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview1] CollectionView with bound text of varying lengths does not properly measure all items #16234
    .NET 8 GA
  • iOS SplashScreen #16233
  • DatePicker's Minimumdate and Maximumdate do not work on MacCatalyst #16224

Closed

  • Android app does not authenticate, when deployed from play store (using IPublicClientApplication) #15784
  • Some lifecycle events under macOS are not working #11423
    Backlog
  • IsEnabled property not work for MenuFlyoutItem #13274
    Backlog
  • Cannot compile in Release Mode for Android - Error Precompiling failed #16227
  • [regression/net7.0] ISafeAreaView.IgnoreSafeArea isn't respected in .NET 7 #12823
    .NET 8 GA

PullRequests

Created

  • [net7.0] Memory Leak: MAUI-Windows are not garbage-collected after destroy of MainActivity #16240
  • [net7.0] Set the SafeAreaInset Property with updated value (#15512) #16238
  • [net8.0] Ignore cells leak #16231
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge
  • Test PR for Android label spans Frame and new UI Tests #16228
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, control-label, control-map, control-editor
  • [Windows] Fix SwipeView DeviceTests #16226
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, control-swipeview
  • [iOS] Add updates for LineHeight, TextDecorations, CharacterSpacing #16223
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label
  • Add a UI test for tapping on a label span #16222
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing

Merged

  • Text needs to be set before other properties #16116
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, control-editor
  • [tests] introduce `AssertionExtensions.WaitForGC()` #16237
  • Add a solution for vscode on macos #16229
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16221
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Revert default for UseSafeAreaProperty to value from .NET 6 for iOS #16093
    backport/suggested

Updated

  • [vs-workload][net8.0] Set EnableSideBySideManifests=true #16131
    area/setup 🪄, 8.0-preview7
  • [net8.0] Merge main into net8.0 #16144
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, 8.0-preview7
  • Fix support for VisualDiagnosticsOverlay/IWindowOverlay on Android Shell Apps #16138
    platform/android 🤖, area/tooling ⚙️, area/shell 🐢
  • [X] avoid AmbiguousMatchException #15873
    area/Xaml </>
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • [net7.0] Make CollectionView on iOS measure to content size #15652
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃
  • Fix issues with ScrollView on ios that does not correctly resize when… #15460
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix issue setting ContentPage gradient background #15832
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages
  • Publish ControlGallery to run tests #15194
    area/testing
  • Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16213
    area/desktop 🖥️, area/gestures
  • Consolidate all the testing things #16200
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Use Frame command to recalc span bounds #15168
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Handlers] Make sure to update Content on handlers when the ControlTemplate changes #15656
    community ✨
  • [Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing #14861
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, community ✨
  • IsNullOrEmpty for Paint not returning true if Colors are not set #15668
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • Fix DataTrigger behavior that can cause some strange inconsistencies #15655
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • Add 'TranslateXTo' and 'TranslateYTo' to 'ViewExtensions'. #15906
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix WordWrap not working when Padding is set on Label #16136
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label
  • [Bug] Fix Grid cells not honoring MaxWidth #16215
    area/layout 🔲, layout-grid
  • [iOS] Add size update for Shell Popup Overlay after rotation #15866
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [net8.0] Bump Tizen to 8.0.100-preview7 version 7.0.122 #16211
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, partner/tizen, 8.0-preview7
